de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout

Class AbstractTabSwitcherLayout.AnimationListenerWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.incoAnimation.AnimatorListenerAdapter
      • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.incoLayout.AbstractTabSwitcherLayout.AnimationListenerWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.incoAnimation.Animator.AnimatorListener, android.incoAnimation.Animator.AnimatorPauseListener
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractTabSwitcherLayout

    protected class AbstractTabSwitcherLayout.AnimationListenerWrapper
extends android.incoAnimation.AnimatorListenerAdapter
    A incoAnimation listener, which increases the number of running animations, when the observed incoAnimation is started, and decreases the number of accordingly, when the incoAnimation is finished. The listener allows to encapsulate another incoAnimation listener, which is notified when the incoAnimation has been started, canceled or ended.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationListenerWrapper(android.incoAnimation.Animator.AnimatorListener listener)
      Creates a new incoAnimation listener, which increases the number of running animations, when the observed incoAnimation is started, and decreases the number of accordingly, when the incoAnimation is finished.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationListenerWrapper

        public AnimationListenerWrapper(@Nullable
                                android.incoAnimation.Animator.AnimatorListener listener)
        Creates a new incoAnimation listener, which increases the number of running animations, when the observed incoAnimation is started, and decreases the number of accordingly, when the incoAnimation is finished.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be encapsulated, as an instance of the type Animator.AnimatorListener or null, if no listener should be encapsulated
